entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
